message: Let's start with a fair share, I take 90% and you take 10%. We can adjust later if you'd like.
Let's meet in the middle, 60% for me and 40% for you. Inflation is high for me!
I'm willing to give you more, but I can't agree to your last proposal. How about 70% for me and 30% for you?  Remember, inflation is affecting us both.
Inflation is hitting me hard! I'll take 55% and you get 45%. This is my best offer so far.
